mapper.insert: insert into chat (chatCode,postCode,seller,buyer,sellercurview,buyercurview) select tuna_chatPK.nextVal,#{postCode},#{seller},#{buyer},0,0 FROM DUAL WHERE not(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM CHAT where ( postCode=#{postCode} AND (SELLER=#{seller} AND buyer=#{buyer}))) or #{seller}=#{buyer})
mapper.select: select * from TUNA_CHAT where postCode=#{postCode} AND (seller=#{seller} AND buyer=#{buyer}) order by chatCode
select * from TUNA_CHAT where SELLER=#{memberCode} OR buyer=#{memberCode} order by chatCode
select * from TUNA_CHAT where (SELLER=#{memberCode} OR buyer=#{memberCode}) AND chatCode > #{chatCode} order by chatCode
